Smart Tape Dispenser: A tape dispenser that can automatically detect when it's running low on tape and reorder it online or alert you to restock.
Tape Dispenser with Built-in Scanner: A tape dispenser that includes a built-in scanner to scan and save labels, making it easier to keep track of inventory or shipping information.
Tape Dispenser with Multiple Dispenser Heads: A tape dispenser that has multiple dispenser heads, allowing you to dispense multiple types of tape at the same time.

Tape Dispenser with Touchless Operation: A tape dispenser that can be operated using touchless technology, such as a foot pedal or voice commands, making it easy to dispense tape without having to touch the dispenser.
Tape Dispenser with Customizable Branding: A tape dispenser that can be customized with your brand's logo or design, making it a great promotional item for businesses.
